summary: The module implements a configurable 2‑D conditional UNet architecture using Flax/JAX. It integrates timestep embeddings, cross‑attention mechanisms, and stacked down‑sampling and up‑sampling blocks to transform a noisy image tensor together with conditioning information into a denoised output of the same spatial dimensions. An accompanying lightweight output container holds the resulting hidden‑state tensor.
business_intent: Enable developers to incorporate a high‑performance, conditional diffusion model component for image synthesis and related generative AI applications, allowing fine‑grained control via conditioning inputs and diffusion timesteps.
